# matchesImageBuffer(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the format description matches an image buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func matchesImageBuffer(_ imageBuffer: CVImageBuffer) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **imageBuffer**: The image buffer to validate against.

## Working with Video Descriptions

- **cleanAperture(originIsAtTopLeft:)**: Returns the clean aperture.
- **presentationDimensions(usePixelAspectRatio:useCleanAperture:)**: Returns the dimensions to take the pixel aspect ratio or clean aperture into account.

items.description: Returns the dimensions to take the pixel aspect ratio or clean aperture into account.
